backend/main.mo: Implements chat backend with room management, message posting/editing, retrieval, reactions, media, and nickname mapping using Motoko and blob-storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Declares feature-evidence report listing redeploy-related files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all frontend source files and their roles in the chat app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind/OKLCH theme variables and light/dark mode styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the SPA and loading main.tsx.
frontend/REDEPLOY.md: Documentation outlining prerequisites and steps for performing a full backend and frontend redeploy.
frontend/scripts/redeploy-verify.sh: Shell script that verifies deployment by checking canister statuses and performing sanity checks.
frontend/scripts/redeploy.sh: Automated redeploy script that rebuilds, upgrades, regenerates bindings, builds frontend, and redeploys canisters.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app managing theme, routing between lobby and rooms, and URL hash sync.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Dropdown theme selector allowing users to switch among light, dark, and system modes.
frontend/src/features/chat/components/Me: Message input component supporting text, file uploads, paste handling, and posting messages with progress tracking.
Renders a single chat message with editing, deleting, replying, reactions, and attachment handling.
frontend/src/features/chat/hooks/useAtta: Hook that caches and manages object URLs for media attachments with cleanup and fingerprinting.
frontend/src/features/chat/hooks/useIdle: Tracks user activity to determine idle state based on a time threshold.
frontend/src/features/chat/reactions/Rea: Displays emoji reactions for a message and allows adding new reactions via a popover.
frontend/src/features/chat/RoomPage.tsx: Main chat room UI handling message fetching, bounded rendering, scrolling, reply state, and room validation.
frontend/src/features/chat/types/chatMes: Defines client-augmented chat message types for optimistic updates and retry metadata.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/attachm: Memoizes attachment metadata keyed by fingerprint with a capped cache.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/detectM: Lightweight MIME detection based on magic numbers in byte data.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/display: Provides a safe display name for message senders, falling back to Anonymous.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/downloa: Utilities for downloading attachments from URLs or bytes and mapping MIME types to file extensions.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/mediaFi: Generates a lightweight string fingerprint for media by combining length and boundary bytes.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/message: Compares two ChatMessage objects by stable fields and media fingerprints to determine structural equality.
Maps various backend and network error patterns into short userâ€‘friendly messages.
Provides message sorting and merging utilities using timestamps, IDs, and optimistic message handling.
Determines whether messages fall within the last hour and filters recent ones based on timestamps.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/polling: Chooses a polling interval based on visibility, activity, and scroll position.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/scrollV: Retrieves a scroll viewport element and provides helpers for scrolling behavior and position checks.
frontend/src/features/chat/utils/structu: Reuses previous message objects when unchanged to reduce React re-renders through structural sharing.
frontend/src/features/lobby/EditNickname: Inline UI component for editing, saving, and clearing a user's nickname with validation.
frontend/src/features/lobby/LobbyPage.ts: Lobby UI handling nickname setup, room creation, and room joining with validation and backend interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and persistence via an application-wide context.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Manages local user ID and nickname persistence using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageVisibility.ts: Provides a hook that returns whether the document is currently visible by listening to visibilitychange events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for room listing, room validation, creation, message fetching, and posting with optimizations and optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useRafThrottledCallba: Implements a hook that throttles a callback so it runs at most once per animation frame.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark mode and chat bubble colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking, and current state for the build system.
